label: AWS S3
description: Store events in an Amazon S3 bucket

config_fields.label: Bucket Name
config_fields.description: The name of your AWS S3 bucket

config_fields.label: AWS Region
config_fields.description: The AWS region where your bucket is located

config_fields.label: Object Key Template
config_fields.description: JMESPath expression for generating S3 object keys. Default: join('', [time.rfc3339_nano, '_', metadata."event-id", '.json'])

config_fields.label: S3 Storage Class
config_fields.description: The storage class for the S3 objects (e.g., STANDARD, INTELLIGENT_TIERING, GLACIER, etc.)
